subject: Physical Fitness
title: The CrossFit Phenomenon
description: Learn The CrossFit Phenomenon in one minute.

hook.text: In 2000, a former gymnast started a garage workout group. Twenty years later, there were 15,000 affiliates worldwide.

buildup.text: CrossFit combined weightlifting, gymnastics, and cardio into high-intensity, constantly varied workouts.

discovery.text: It created community around suffering. Shared hard workouts built loyalty that traditional gyms couldn't match.

twist.text: Critics pointed to high injury rates. Pushing untrained people through complex lifts at speed raised concerns.

climax.text: Love it or hate it, CrossFit proved that community and intensity are powerful motivators for fitness adherence.

punchline.text: CrossFit showed that people will pay to suffer â€” if they suffer together.
